A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My reasoning for 2.5 stars. There were both some major and minor issues in this episode of Star Wars. The slow middle portions in CB I'd say are median\, minor technical shots such as Leia in space witch mode\, and major issues such as continuity in story due to change in directors between JJ / Rian Johnson. If there was one director I believe it would have a more linear - story driven feel rather than a director's choice grab bag for the end result. Now we are left with a semi open field for Episode 9 as we have another change in direction. I'm not a hardcore fan\, but I didn't like the direction this film drove the new trilogy.
